feed.title: Combined summary - BIP 21 accepted, new BIP 19

entry.title: Combined summary - BIP 21 accepted, new BIP 19
entry.summary: Bitcoin Improvement Proposal 21, or BIP 21, has gained widespread acceptance among major implementations in the cryptocurrency world. For more information about this proposal, users can visit the Bitcoin Wiki page for BIP 21. Another proposal, BIP 19, aims to add a new payment type to the scripting system's template list, which can be found on the Bitcoin Wiki page for BIP 19. Although the person speaking about it hasn't fully evaluated it, they believe it appears to be solid. However, they do have some concerns about the use of arithmetic operators, which can behave in unusual ways.
